channel.title: SevenAtSevenPolitics
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from SevenAtSevenPolitics, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Slipping on ICE: innocent retailers are the latest collateral damage from Trump’s perpetual noise machine
item.description: ICE is slipping on a puddle of its own making. Let's not put the rest of our crucial nationwide retailers on shaky footing.
